prospects.name: Matthew Christy
prospects.first_line: Matthew, with Bluestone Lane’s 20th NYC location on West Broadway, managing multi-site teams must be complex—Homebase can simplify scheduling and compliance.
prospects.evidence_quote: This is the chain’s 20th (!) location in the city despite taking a huge hit during covid.

prospects.name: Isaac Reback
prospects.first_line: Isaac, with sweetgreen’s 916 locations, including 180 in NY, staffing must be a challenge—Homebase streamlines scheduling and payroll for multi-site teams.
prospects.evidence_quote: There are 916 Sweetgreen restaurants in the United States as of June 23, 2025... New York, with 180 restaurants.

prospects.name: Tiffany Porter
prospects.first_line: Tiffany, with Massage Envy’s nationwide footprint, operations must be demanding—Homebase cuts labor chaos with simple scheduling and compliance tools.
prospects.evidence_quote: Massage Envy is a nationwide wellness franchise providing massage, stretch, and skin care services.
